trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Platteville
There were no other sightings in Platteville on or around January 5th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home on hwy 85. Near Platteville, CO Saw one single light bright. I thought I was watching a plane with landing lights on. As it changed angle in the sky it turned from one light to 2 sets of 3 long lights on each side. Angled like wings would be. Just on the side of one light it looked grey. The lights were bright white. Direction was North when it was one single light. Started to change direction,turning toward the East than saw the 2 sets of 3 long lights. Finished turn to the South. Lights stayed on til I couldnt see it anymore. I reported this to Weld County MUFON and the National Reporting Center.
